game.name: Beneath the Stars
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A narrative exploration inspired by The Little Prince. Journey through dreamlike worlds suspended among the clouds — searching for meaning, memory, and connection beneath the stars.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A narrative exploration inspired by The Little Prince. Journey through dreamlike worlds suspended among the clouds — searching for meaning, memory, and connection beneath the stars.
